bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: DL4J/ND4J: Serialization (spark tests, maybe elsewhere) spamming serialization messages
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2360237/40400250-ab5c824e-5e84-11e8-86da-15f0aa092a28.png></denchmark-link>
This is probably related to long shapes. However, as far as I can tell there is not any datatype issues here - i.e., it should all be double precision.

comments.comment: It's happening for me when deserializing "compressed" arrays. This isn't new though, it's been doing that before as well.
I can confirm that this is still happening on current master.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
